Title: Buffet Froid
Plot: The BAU investigates a murder in which two victims' faces are similarly mutilated; given a "Glasgow Smile." For the first time, Will contaminates a crime scene thinking he committed the first murder and an MRI shows he suffers from Advanced Encephalitis. But Hannibal intimidates the attending physician, Dr. Sutcliffe, into telling Will he's okay. Writer: Andrew Black, Chris Brancato	, Bryan Fuller
GuestStars: Scott Thompson, Aaron Abrams, Ellen Muth, John Benjamin Hickey
